chat.title: Primary color
chat.content: Set the primary color of the chat.

chat.title: Secondary color
chat.content: Set the secondary color of the chat.

chat.title: Tertiary color
chat.content: Set the tertiary color of the chat.

chat.title: RTL
chat.content: Activate the Right-To-Left (RTL) layout.

chat.title: Manual initialization
chat.content: Disable the chat auto initialization. When this setting is active you must initialize the chat via the Javascript APIs.

chat.title: Login initialization
chat.content: Initialize and display the chat only if the user is already logged in.

chat.title: Dashboard
chat.content: Display the dashboard instead of the chat area on initalization.

chat.title: Hide chat if not office hours
chat.content: Disable and hide the chat if not office hours.

chat.title: Translate automatically
chat.content: Translate the chat automatically to match the browser language of the user.

chat.title: Open automatically
chat.content: Open the chat automatically when a new message is received.

chat.title: Articles
chat.content: Display the articles area in the dashboard and to new users.

chat.title: Articles title
chat.content: Articles archive panel title.

chat.title: Chat position
chat.content: Set the chat position.

chat.title: Timetable
chat.content: Display the timetable of the office hours to the user after the first message is sent, only if not office hours.

chat.title: Privacy message
chat.content: Display a message with a text and Accept or Decline buttons, the user must click Accept to start using the chat. Useful for privacy policy and GDPR.

chat.title: Popup message
chat.content: Display an outer popup message to new users.

chat.title: Welcome message
chat.content: Display an automatic message to new users.

chat.title: Follow up message
chat.content: Display a message to ask the user email if no agents reply within 15 seconds.

chat.title: Display users profile image
chat.content: Display the profile image of the users on the chat.

chat.title: Hide agents profile image
chat.content: Hide the profile image of the agents from the chat.

chat.title: Header headline
chat.content: The top header title, this text will be replaced by the agent name when the first reply is sent.

chat.title: Header message
chat.content: The top header text, this text will be replaced by the agent headline when the first reply is sent.

chat.title: Header type
chat.content: Set the header appearance.

chat.title: Header user's name
chat.content: Replace the header title with the user's first name and last name when available.

chat.title: Header brand image
chat.content: Display a the brand image in the header. *only for brand header type.

chat.title: Header background image
chat.content: Apply a custom header background image.

chat.title: Chat button icon
chat.content: Change the chat button image.

notifications.title: Sounds
notifications.content: Play a sound notification when the user receive a new message.

notifications.title: Agent email notifications
notifications.content: Send an email to the agents when a user reply. For new users the email is sent to all agents.

notifications.title: User email notifications
notifications.content: Send an email to the user when a agent reply.

notifications.title: Desktop notifications
notifications.content: Show a desktop notification when a new message is received.

notifications.title: Flash notifications
notifications.content: Show a browser tab notification when a new message is received.

notifications.title: Users email
notifications.content: Email template for the email sent to the user when an egent reply. You can use text, HTML and the following patterns: {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.

notifications.title: Agents email
notifications.content: Email template for the email sent to the agents when a user send a new message. You can use text, HTML and the following patterns: {recipient_name}, {sender_name}, {sender_profile_image}, {message}, {attachments}.

notifications.title: Test user email
notifications.content: Send yourself the email that the users will receive and check it.

notifications.title: Test agent email
notifications.content: Send yourself the email that the agents will receive and check it.

users.title: Register all visitors
users.content: Register all visitors automatically. When this option is not active only the visitors that start a chat will be registered.

users.title: Require registration
users.content: Require the user registration before start a chat.

users.title: Registration form fields
users.content: Choose what to include in the registration form. First name, last name and email are included by default. The login form require the password field.

users.title: Include profile image
users.content: Include the profile image field in the registration form to allow the user to upload a profile image.

users.title: Password
users.content: Include the password field in the registration form.

users.title: Additional fields
users.content: Add additional fields to the user profile details.

users.title: Include additional fields
users.content: Include the additional fields to the registration form.

various.title: Envato Purchase Code
various.content: Insert here the Envato Purchase Code to activate the updates and unlock all the features. See the docs for more details.

various.title: Automatic updates
various.content: Automatically check and install new updates. A valid Envato Purchase Code and valid apps's license keys are required.

various.title: Translate admin automatically
various.content: Translate the admin area automatically to match the browser language.

various.title: Office hours
various.content: Set when the agents are available and it's used as reference for all the settings related to date and time. See the docs for more details.

various.title: UTC Offset
various.content: Set the UTC offset of the timetable. See the docs for more details.

various.title: Saved replies
various.content: Manage here the saved replies that will be available in the chat editor of the agents. Saved replies can be printed by typing # followed by the reply name.

various.title: Rich messages
various.content: Rich Messages are code snippets ready to be included into a chat message, they can contain HTML and they are rendered only to the user chat. Rich Messages can be included into the chat with the following sintax: [rich-message-name]. There are built-in rich messages, see the docs for more details.
